examples.korean: We deliver the goods in batches. 발음듣기 우리는 그 물건들을 (일괄적으로) 묶어서 배달한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: It only costs one dollar by the lump. 발음듣기 그것은 한데 묶어서 단돈 1달러이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: However, the fish was too big to fit in their small boat, and they brought the fish to shore by tying the fish to the boat. 발음듣기 그렇지만, 물고기가 너무 커서 작은 보트에는 들어가지 않아서, 그들은 보트에 물고기를 묶어서 해안으로 옮겼어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: However, the fish was too big to fit in their small boat, and they brought the fish to shore by tying the fish to the boat. 발음

examples.korean: Most northern European countries shut their airspace over the period April 15-20, grounding an estimated ten million travelers worldwide and costing the airline industry $3.06 billion. 발음듣기 대부분의 북유럽 국가들이 4월 15일에서 20일 까지 자국의 항공 운항을 폐쇄해서, 약 전세계적으로 약 천만 명의 여행객들의 발을 묶어서 항공산업에 약30억 6천만 달러의 손해를 가져왔다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: Most northern European countries shut their airspace over the period April 15-20, grounding an estimated ten million travelers worldwide and costing the airline industry $3.06 billion. 발음

examples.korean: We need to deal with that collectively. 발음듣기 우리는 그것을 한데 묶어서 처리할 필요가 있다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 최지수(jis9****) Hansard
